result.eng: I like the Aran sweaters that are available in Standún's Shop.
result.ga: Is maith liom na geansaithe Árann atá le fáil i siopa Standúin
result.orig: Is maith liom na geansaithe Árann atá le fáil i siopa Standúin
result.html: Is maith liom na geansaithe Árann atá le fáil i siopa StandúinI like the Aran sweaters that are available in Standún's Shop.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom na geansaiṫe Árann atá le fáil i siopa StandúinI like the Aran sweaters that are available in Standún's Shop.

result.eng: There are plenty of jumpers here.
result.html: Tá neart geansaithe anseoThere are plenty of jumpers here.
result.ponchtml: Tá neart geansaiṫe anseoThere are plenty of jumpers here.
